title: MODSetter/SurfSense

title: yuma-shintani/ollama-model-library

title: FunKite/solunatus

title: lobehub/lobe-chat
summary: 🤯 LobeHub - an open-source, modern design AI Agent Workspace. Supports multiple AI providers, Knowledge Base (file upload / RAG ), one click install MCP Marketplace and Artifacts / Thinking. One-click FREE deployment of your private AI Agent application.

title: open-webui/open-webui
summary: User-friendly AI Interface (Supports Ollama, OpenAI API, ...)

title: angrysky56/reflective-agent-architecture
summary: Metacognitive AI architecture combining Modern Hopfield Networks with entropy-based confusion detection for insight-like problem solving. Implements energy-based search, adaptive beta scaling, and a Cognitive Database integration for analogical reasoning and topology tunneling.

title: schmitech/orbit
summary: An adaptable, open-source context-aware inference engine designed for privacy, control, and independence from proprietary models.

title: malgorath/laravel-resume-builder-ai
summary: PHP/Laravel Framework that takes a PDF/DOCX resume and performs various AI related tasks using a ollama LLM installed locally.

title: kendalblythe/generative-ai-app
summary: Generative AI web application

title: ortus-boxlang/bx-ai
summary: One Fluent/Functional API to access Large Language Models in BoxLang

title: Mintplex-Labs/anything-llm
summary: The all-in-one Desktop & Docker AI application with built-in RAG, AI agents, No-code agent builder, MCP compatibility,  and more.

title: JetBrains/koog
summary: Koog is the official Kotlin framework for building predictable, fault-tolerant and enterprise-ready AI agents across all platforms – from backend services to Android and iOS, JVM, and even in-browser environments. Koog is based on our AI products expertise and provides proven solutions for complex LLM and AI problems

title: browseros-ai/BrowserOS
summary: 🌐 The open-source Agentic browser; privacy-first alternative to ChatGPT Atlas, Perplexity Comet, Dia.

title: Carricacha/local-rag-system
summary: 🤖 Build your own local Retrieval-Augmented Generation system for private, offline AI memory without ongoing costs or data privacy concerns.

title: namaaman872-web/codeex-v5

title: Akshayzade123/ai-knowledge-assistant-python
summary: 🤖 Build a robust AI Knowledge Assistant for enterprises, offering context-aware Q&A, document management, and secure access control with a high-performance API.

title: eliranwong/agentmake
summary: AgentMake AI: a kit for developing agentic AI applications that support 16 AI backends and and work with 7 agentic components, such as tools and agents. (Developer: Eliran Wong) Supported backends: anthropic, azure, azure_any, cohere, custom, deepseek, genai, github, github_any, googleai, groq, llamacpp, mistral, ollama, openai, vertexai, xai

title: milothoelen/AI-ChatBot
summary: 🤖 Build personalized chatbots in just 5 cells using Colab and Groq, making AI visually appealing and user-friendly.
